description: System modeling and simulation involves creating abstract models of complex systems to analyze their behavior under various conditions. This process helps engineers understand system dynamics, optimize performance, and predict outcomes before implementation.
you_have_this_if: You need to analyze the behavior of a complex system.
You are dealing with interconnected components.
You need to represent implicit dependencies accurately.
You are looking for a framework to facilitate system modeling.

approaches.best_for: Modeling complex systems with implicit dependencies and real-time simulation requirements.
approaches.key_tradeoff: While Modelica provides accurate representations, it may require a steep learning curve for new users.

decision_matrix.best_when: You need to model complex systems with real-time simulation needs and accurate inter-component interactions.

start_here: Start with Modelica for its robust capabilities in modeling complex systems, especially when real-time simulation and accuracy are critical.
